author: cmpilato
msg: Syncronize the dump/load code here with the code in /trunk.  That
involves porting the recent 2634 change to this branch, as well as
part of the 2100 change made long ago which I think never got ported

author: cmpilato
msg: Port revision 2634 change committed to /trunk to this branch.
Update to reflect new dumpfile format.
(SVN_REPOS_DUMPFILE_NODE_NOTICE): Get outta here, you nasty little hack.
(write_revision_record): Also use prop contents length header.
(dump_node): Use new headers and optionally dump props and/or
(parse_property_block): New, with all the property handling goo from
the old parse_content_block function.  Change all 'goto'
statements to just return the results of the new error-creation
(parse_text_block): Was parse_content_block.  Now only treats the
content as replacement textual node contents.  Remove `is_node'.

author: cmpilato
msg: Update to reflect new dumpfile format.
(SVN_REPOS_DUMPFILE_NODE_NOTICE): Get outta here, you nasty little hack.
(write_revision_record): Also use prop contents length header.
(dump_node): Use new headers and optionally dump props and/or
(parse_property_block): New, with all the property handling goo from
the old parse_content_block function.  Change all 'goto'
statements to just return the results of the new error-creation
(parse_text_block): Was parse_content_block.  Now only treats the
content as replacement textual node contents.  Remove `is_node'.

author: rooneg
msg: we no longer have a -d flag for 'svn co', so don't mention it.  instead,
explain the optional final parameter that has taken it's place.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix some more URI encoding problems.
(dav_svn_simple_parse_uri): URI-decode URL portions used as paths.
(create_private): No longer URI-decode the URL.  What was I thinking?
